name: Truth Or Dare
description:
Single-player 3D Horror Game co-created by Eloise Lavoie-Dufour and Ross Curry

Claire and Jamie approach an abandoned mansion, to fulfill a dare, will it be their last? One big mansion, one even bigger dare.

Rated T

Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2022 Entry

*When game jam voting ends we will update with some features and scares that didn't make the deadline that we are really excited to share with you : ) *

We had so much fun making this and can't wait to add a lot of the ending and features that were cut to make the game jam deadline. This game had a development cycle of 3 days since we found out about the game jam late, great job @elo_lavoie!  I'm really proud of what we came up with :)
